medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began becoming increasingly irritable and inconsolable for 12 hours before admission. The patient last ingested buprenorphine approximately 48 hours prior to admission. There was no sleep in the previous 24 hours, and despite measures to calm her, irritability and agitation worsened.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had administered buprenorphine since birth; attempted suicide two days before admission.
